ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] gforce 2
ygData.msgSnippet: If your looking at buying a new graphics board you should *not* look at pci boards. AGP offers a lot of speed advantages, stick with your old one and as Laine
ygData.messageBody:
If your looking at buying a new graphics board you should *not* look at pci
boards. AGP offers a lot of speed advantages, stick with your old one and as
Laine says, the prices will drop when Geoforce4 will hit the market.



-----Original Message-----
From: mlockridge01 [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: Monday, March 11, 2002 10:30 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] gforce 2


I have an Nvidia tnt2 64 graphics card. PCI. I have seen the gforce 2
for about $45. I am wondering if I can expect much improved
performance with the gforce 2. Both are pci, both 32k. I get lots of
lag in Rivervale, most of Luclin, and some of the other cities. Not
everywhere, just where lots of people gather and the backgrounds are
graphics intensive.

I don't have the money to go for the gforce 3, and I don't even know
if the 3 comes in pci format. I need another hard disk as well as
doing a graphics upgrade, so the money needs to stay around that $45.

I would want a very obvious improvement to even bother with the
upgrade on the graphics.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
